title: A Community of Apocalyptic Love
description:
The Apostle Paul faces divisions in synagogues, divisions in the church, and an imperial context that is confused about the Holy Spirit's manifestations of power. But the Empire is conquered by communities of apocalyptic love. 

Acts 14

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/XFXMZeFq
